message.content:
{"id": "115960", 
"title": "Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item", 
"description": "When retrieving datetime values from a table, there is a discrepancy in the format displayed between a dynamic text item and a data/text item.", 
"OB": "Open the application and navigate to the page with the datetime values. Input a new Date() as content for the three items. Save the changes and preview the page. The expected result is that all three items should show the same format for the datetime values.", 
"EB": "However, the actual result is that the data and text item display the same format for the datetime values, but the dynamic text item displays a different format.", 
"SR": "The dynamic text item should display the datetime values in the same format as the data and text item. Please investigate and fix this discrepancy."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '115960', 'title': 'Bug 115960Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item', 'description': '', 'OB': '', 'EB': 'Input new Date() as content for three items.3Save and preview.Expected result:They show the same form.Actual result:Data and text item were the same but dyanmic text was different. ', 'SR': ''}
